data.message: That's a shame no Gloucester this year! My kids have never missed it.

replies.message: I remember they did Cheltenham (Hi from down the road!) and it was in the car park behind the Brewery before they did work on a shop that never was or something like that and its been funny to see Cheltonians moaning because without the car park as it was as it's just become one again and it's not in the shape it was, there's nowhere in town for it to go. Think Swindon or Bristol is a best bet, but for a truck with the massive queues it has, it's questionable if it's worth it, points about petrol or train money aside.
Hey Joanna, please check out our on-pack promotion for a chance to win a visit from the truck http://spr.ly/618681cM6
